mapper.update: update site_field_material_mgt set batch_id=#{batchid}, temp=#{temp}, weight=#{weight},datetime=#{datetime}, edit_user_id=#{edituserid}, edit_datetime=#{editdatetime} where id=#{id}
update site_field_material_mgt set delete_state=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT sfmm.*,bm.licence_plate,bm.batch,bm.unloaded_weight,sfm.fl_name,srm.road_no,srm.road_name, uu.u_name,(bm.loading_weight-bm.unloaded_weight) as yuguweight FROM site_field_material_mgt sfmm LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from batch_mgt bm WHERE bm.delete_state!=0) bm ON sfmm.batch_id = bm.id LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management sfm ON bm.pitch_type = sfm.fl_id AND sfm.delete_state != 0 LEFT JOIN u_user uu ON sfmm.edit_user_id = uu.user_id AND uu.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_road_mgn srm on bm.road_id = srm.road_id and srm.delete_state = 1 where sfmm.delete_state != 0 AND sfmm.batch_id = bm.id ORDER BY sfmm.datetime desc

select sfmm.*,bm.licence_plate,bm.batch,bm.unloaded_weight,sfm.fl_name,srm.road_no,srm.road_name, uu.u_name,(bm.loading_weight-bm.unloaded_weight) as yuguweight from site_field_material_mgt as sfmm left join batch_mgt as bm on sfmm.batch_id=bm.id AND bm.delete_state!=0 LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management sfm ON bm.pitch_type = sfm.fl_id AND sfm.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN u_user uu ON sfmm.edit_user_id = uu.user_id AND uu.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_road_mgn srm on bm.road_id = srm.road_id and srm.delete_state != 0 where sfmm.delete_state!=0 AND sfmm.batch_id in (SELECT id from batch_mgt WHERE road_id=#{roadId} and delete_state!=0)
